name: Satelite Phones
description: The phones available to Arctic researchers provide global reliable voice using a variety of satellite-based services. Data, fax, messaging, and email services are also available bundled into the phone or as separate kits or configurations

name: Safety Equipment
description: SRI provides two location devices for fielding and support to researchers while in the field.

name: Power Equipment
description: Several technologies are available for remote power systems in arctic environments

name: Radios
description: The radios available to Arctic researchers provide ground and air communication services. Base stations and repeaters may be utilized to extend the radio “network”.
